name: Win by failing
description:
Its a tiny little game where you have to fail at least once to win. where every time you fail, you become stronger(I mean you have to remember the moves lol)

Go to the her(The pink square X) )

Don't fall in the spikes!!

Controls:

D - left

A - right

W - to jump

R= to restart

This game is a little bit hard to complete. 

By the way its a love story(Did you get it ?lol)

You can comment below about the game ^-^
